title: Unraveling sleep respiratory dysfunction in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis: Beyond the apnea-hypopnea index and sleep-related hypoxia
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Andi Nuredini, Dario Bottignole, Filippo Stragliati, Pietro Anceschi, Sonia Romano, Irene Pollara, Anna Abramo, Francesco Rausa, Liborio Parrino, Lucia Zinno, Carlotta Mutti
